text: A not too Christmassy thought: As it took so little to find a #vaccine against #COVID19,how long would it take to find a vaccine against #malaria,if #BigPharma & governments wanted to? Malaria kills ~1million people each year,but only in #DevelopingCountries. #GlobalHealth https://t.co/dboGPK0jv4 https://t.co/vuAEoXJ0ye
